data.name: Affinity: Fallen from Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Fallen from a world above, you wake up dazed in a new world. What is this world, how did you get here. With the past clawing at you're mind, you set out to learn not just about this new world, but the one you left behind.

Embark on a non-linear story where you choose where to explore, what to fight, and who to save. Gain abilities so powerful they leave you reeling, fighting the wildlife to other worldly beasts and fend off your own insanity.

Exploration of this unknown world is the main focus, direction of where to go will be given but there won't be any hand holding.
The path forward has many keys, discover your own way forward. Master the magical depths of you soul, choosing between Fire,Ice and more to learn;
Or discover non elemental ancient magic to fight againist the other worldly dangers that lie to be discovered.

Features:

A story of struggle of and hardship, surviving againist unknown threats.

Use magical abilities to survive againist your enemies.

A vast skilltree, allowing to master a element or use them inconjuction with others.

Dense side content that is as rich as the main story.

Tons of different ways to engage with the combat, fueling multiple playthroughs.

data.short_description: Journey through a broken world, discovering its long forgotten secrets. Experience a non linear story in a lore filled world, and learning new abilities to survive againist otherworldly threats. Can you make it back to Paradise?
